Posts.Content: Jul 21, 2008 05:09AM Elizabeth07 wrote: Hello everone, I'm new.  It's been ten days since my first chemo session and I'm showing no evidence of hair loss.  Everything I've read says it starts to fall out around the 14th day.  At this point the anxiety of reaching DAY 14 is beginning to get to me.  Last night I had a nightmare all of my hair fell out while I was sleeping.  Please, someone tell me it happens a little more gradually.  I've already cut 12 inches of hair in preparation for the day it falls out completely.  Seems so silly the remaining two inches will be the most difficult to part with. Are there many cases of NO hair loss with chemo?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
